name: netphos
publications: Sequence- and structure-based prediction of eukaryotic protein phosphorylation sites.  Blom, N., Gammeltoft, S., and Brunak, S.  Journal of Molecular Biology: 294(5): 1351-1362, 1999.
description: neural network predictions for serine, threonine and tyrosine phosphorylation sites in eukaryotic proteins.
